edge: Plagiarism allegations have been raised against the movie Raabta as it is alleged to have copied certain scenes from the Telugu movie Magadheera. Producer Allu Aravind of Geetha Arts filed a legal notice in this regard and the makers of Raabta offered to show him the film and also deposit an escrow amount with the court, but their offer was rejected.
The release date of the movie Raabta was initially set for 2016, but it was delayed due to casting issues. In March 2016, a new release date of 9 June 2017 was announced.
The film production of Raabta began in 2015.
Initially, Alia Bhatt was considered to play the lead role opposite Sushant Singh Rajput, but she turned down the role due to scheduling conflicts.
In December 2015, Asin was approached to play the lead role opposite Sushant Singh Rajput, but she also turned down the offer.
Later in February 2016, Kriti Sanon was signed on to play the lead female role in the film.
The budget of Raabta is ₹59.07 Crores (₹590.7 Million).
As of the output, the total number of screen counts for Raabta in India was 1820 and 330 overseas.
